translation.gettingStartedBody: TON.Vote is a completely decentralized, on-chain DAO governance platform built exclusively for the TON ecosystem. /n Setting up a Forum for your project requires 2 stages: /n 1.Forum Details: Basic details about your project. /n 2.Create Forum: Owners, admins and special roles. /n Each stage is deployed as a smart contract on the TON blockchain and requires you to sign a transaction in your TON wallet. /n Any change to one of the above stages once deployed, will also require you to sign another transaction. /n *The reason for creating two separate smart contracts is that changes in the Forum's details (such as website url update, New Telegram channel, etc. which are more likely to change), will not entail re-deployment of the Registration contract. /n Need help? Join the TON.vote Telegram [support channel](https://t.me/TONVoteSupportGroup).
translation.editForumDetailsWarning: Edits will require to sign a transaction in your wallet
translation.projectAboutTooltip:
What is your project about? 
 Supports Markdown for editing, adding images, etc. [Read more](https://www.markdownguide.org/basic-syntax/)
translation.spaceAvatarTootlip: Your project’s logo, 512*512 Pixel PNG image URL
translation.tonDnsTooltip: Enter your project’s DNS domain or follow the instructions on [https://dns.ton.org/](https://dns.ton.org/)
translation.endedAndDidntPassedQuorum: Proposal ended and didnt passed the minimim quorum
